name: Unmanned Orbital Defences
desc: An interception network of a number of independent small to medium sized orbital defence platforms, capable of intercepting enemy ships and thus making enemy operations on the ground extremely difficult.

name: TDB Directorate General
desc: The heart of the Traversers' Association, the towering complex hosts countless officers and politicians who lead the direction of the Association.

name: Unmanned Fleet Command
desc: The headquarters of the Unmanned Fleet, responsible for the development of the Overwatch Program and the command of a large number of unmanned defence fleets, is responsible for maintaining the security of the Design Bureau at all times.
